name: DailyAffirmation-Unlockyourfullpotential
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily affirmation
des:
Manifest your goals and dreams with a new affirmation each day that will drive positive change in your life and unlock your true potential. 

We have:
* Motivational Affirmations
* Celebrity Affirmations
* User Submitted Affirmations

Sign up for premium to get
* High quality voiceover
* Recap yesterday's affirmation
* Daily reminders 

Send us your own user-submitted affirmations for the skill at support@stokedskills.com.
Please include your Affirmation, your name and a interesting fact you'd like to share
 
If you like the skill, please leave us a review, your feedback is valued greatly.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
